springapp.service
Class EmployeesService

java.lang.Object
  springapp.service.EmployeesService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEmployeesService
@Transactional(readOnly=false,
               isolation=REPEATABLE_READ)
public class EmployeesService
extends java.lang.Object
implements IEmployeesService

Provides service-methods for processing operations, related with Employee

addEmployee

@Transactional
public void addEmployee(FormEmployee formEmployee)
Adds employee with the data from formEmployee into database Transforms edited name of division in a look "Aaaaa" (first letter is uppercase, others are lowercase)

Specified by:
addEmployee in interface IEmployeesService
Parameters:
formEmployee - object, that contains data of inputing employee

editEmployee

@Transactional
public void editEmployee(FormEmployee formEmployee)
Replaces data of employee with the id from formEmployee from database on the data from formEmployee Transforms edited name of division in a look "Aaaaa" (first letter is uppercase, others are lowercase)

Specified by:
editEmployee in interface IEmployeesService
Parameters:
formEmployee - entity, that contains data for editing

findEmployeeById

@Transactional(readOnly=true)
public Employee findEmployeeById(long id)
Finds Employees by id=id from database Compares received id with the id of each employee from the database. Return Employee with id, which matched if there isn't any Employee with this id, method returns null

Specified by:
findEmployeeById in interface IEmployeesService
Parameters:
id - id of searching Employee
Returns:
found Employee by id

searchEmployeesByName

public java.util.ArrayList<Employee> searchEmployeesByName(SearchEntity searchEntity)
Gets the ArrayList of employees. Every of these employees matches with search string to LowerCase each matching string to exclude influence of register/ Compares input pattern with 2 variants of data of each employee: firstname+lastname and lastname+firstname

Specified by:
searchEmployeesByName in interface IEmployeesService
Parameters:
searchEntity - entity, that contains search string
Returns:
ArrayList of employees
